pages.title: Welcome!
pages.text: Welcome to AstroExpansion, a mod that adds space exploration, advanced technology, and new worlds to discover!$(br2)This guide book will help you navigate through the mod's features, from your first basic machines to complex space stations and beyond.

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: To begin your journey to the stars:$(br)1. Collect basic resources$(br)2. Build your first machines$(br)3. Generate power$(br)4. Craft a Probe Rocket$(br)5. Establish a Launch Rail$(br)6. Start exploring space!$(br2)Each step is detailed in the relevant sections of this guide.

pages.title: Progression Path
pages.text: AstroExpansion follows a progression path:$(br)• Early Game: Basic machines, probe rockets$(br)• Mid Game: Personal rockets, space suits, first space visit$(br)• Late Game: Cargo shuttles, space stations, advanced tech$(br)• End Game: Interplanetary travel, fusion power, matter fabrication
